GSD.description:
iio: dummy: iio_simple_dummy: check the return value of kstrdup()

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.10.122 by commit 8caa4b7d411c429e5beed7952d9c5af8ee2ac68c. For more details please see the references link.
